description: Responsible of architecting and coding the core of the product, mentoring developers, reviewing code, and sharing knowledge about best practices. Peoplebox's product is utilized by world-wide renowned companies like Disney+ Hotstar and Postman.

Responsible for designing and coding customized frontend & automation solutions tailored to meet the specific requirements of the company at it's particular point of growing. Provided unique solutions that could not be found elsewhere by the team.

Founder of a small team of developers, overseeing decision-making, and backend developer. Responsible for managing the entire architecture of the services the company offers to customers, while also leading my fellow founders.

Second time around. Worked closely with UI designers on website and application development, crafting solutions for various local businesses in Chile. My collaboration has earned the company a reputation for being flexible and proficient in our work.

Crafting unique websites and UI designs for my clients. Consistently utilized the latest development tools and well- stablished technologies in all projects. Author of open source jQuery plugins and PHP libraries.

Developing websites using the latest web technologies of the time. Serving a variety of local businesses including hotels, real estate portals, and metallurgical factories. Highlighting well-known companies in Chile like CardinaleÂ® .
